evidence.claim: Bolna utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless functions.
Their system is HIPAA compliant, indicating secure handling of health data.
They implement FHIR standards for interoperability of health data.
Use of X12 for electronic medical transactions is mentioned in their integration documentation.
PostgreSQL and MongoDB are part of their backend technology stack.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of engagement with X12 transactions or clearinghouse functionalities.
